message.content:
cs.RO, cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the technical limitations of the Pepper robot and proposes a solution to enable it to provide interactive tours, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The paper also focuses on the social interaction aspect of the robot, which suggests a potential fit for the human-computer interaction (cs.HC) category. The proposed solution involves using machine learning algorithms to improve the robot's sensing capabilities, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of computer vision techniques to enable the robot to navigate the environment, which suggests a potential fit for the computer vision (cs.CV) category. Finally, the paper discusses the use of the robot in a laboratory setting, which suggests a potential fit for the systems and control (cs.SY) category.
